primary.title: Routing software that makes delivery easy
primary.description: Simplify your delivery operation and save hours each day. Circuit for Teams routing software makes it easy to optimize multiple driver routes, keep customers updated, and get proof of delivery.

primary.title: 1000+ dispatchers  use Circuit for Teams route planning software to help make delivery easy

items.Title: Import spreadsheets to make multiple deliveries easy
items.description: Export a list of deliveries and import it into the Circuit for Teams routing software in 2 minutes or less. Got notes and other info you want drivers to see, that's not a problem, either.

items.Title: Track drivers to know where your packages are
items.description: Track the progress of your drivers in the field. See where they've been, where they are and where they're going in real time.

items.Title: Add time windows and priority deliveries for important stops
items.description: A customer paid for morning delivery, or a specific time slot? Include this in the spreadsheet or add manually and we'll make sure drivers arrive in time.

primary.title: Start route planning in less than 5 minutes
primary.description: Got a list of stops and list of drivers? We'll handle the rest – no need to spend hours each morning manually figuring out the best way to allocate your routes between the drivers.

image.alt: Example showing "Import from spreadsheet" in Circuit for Teams

mobile.alt: Example showing "Import from spreadsheet" in Circuit for Teams

items.Title: Get proof of delivery for your peace of mind
items.description: Need to know who signed for that package? Recipient names, signatures and photo proof are synced and saved for every stop.

items.Title: Send customer notifications to make sure they'll be in
items.description: Give your customers peace of mind with upto date notifications available by email or SMS.

items.Title: Get accurate arrival times to give a better customer experience
items.description: Need to know what time your driver will arrive at stop 5? The Circuit for Teams ETAs will update automatically depending on whether the driver is behind or ahead of schedule.

primary.title: Track and manage everything in one place
primary.description: Driver tracking, proof of delivery, notifications, ETAs – Circuit routing software gives you everything you need to deliver successfully.

image.alt: Example showing proof of delivery (PoD) signature in Circuit for Teams

mobile.alt: Example showing proof of delivery (PoD) signature in Circuit for Teams

primary.title: How Burd Eggs Saved 30+ Hours a Week in Payroll
primary.description: When Zac started using Circuit, his direct-to-consumer delivery business became streamlined. Everything he needed for route optimization and tracking was available in the Circuit routing software.

image.alt: Zac with a lot of chickens and a chicken in his shoulder

primary.title: 1000+ businesses love Circuit for Teams routing software
primary.description: “Circuit really saves us a lot of time, it saves us a lot of mental energy. So more than just those saved hours, I and my time are a lot less exhausted.” Zac Burd of Burd Eggs

items.title: Dispatch
items.description: For teams who just want to create and track routes for their drivers.

items.title: Recipient
items.description: For teams who need proof of delivery and recipient notifications.

items.title: Premium
items.description: For teams with vehicles of different sizes or who need to export data.

primary.title: Make delivery easy with fair pricing that scales as you grow
primary.description: For 3% of what you pay your drivers, you could have them deliver 20% more packages

primary.title: Everything you need to make delivery easy. All in one place.
primary.description: Route, track, and manage your delivery operation, with no map books, no local area knowledge, and no learning curve; just multiple optimized routes, driver tracking, and customer notifications, in just a few clicks.

primary.title: Start optimizing your routes for free

meta_title: Circuit for Teams - Route Planning Software for Last Mile Delivery
meta_description: Circuit for Teams offers route planning software for multiple drivers. Easily optimize delivery routes, track last mile delivery, and update customers, all in one place – saving you hours.

social_cards.social_card_description: Simplify your delivery operation and save hours each day. Circuit for Teams makes it easy to optimize multiple driver routes, keep customers updated, and get proof of delivery.
